DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , crossover study examine bioavailability pramlintide normal weight overweight subject type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus use insulin .
DOC.criteria: HbA1c value 612 % BMI < = 27 kg/m2 BMI > =30 < = 45 kg/m2 Consistent insulin regimen 2 month prior screen
